casebody.data:
William KAHNEY; Plaintiff—Appellant Jerri KAHNEY Plaintiff v. Darren HEAVNER Defendant—Appellee No. 01-5865. United States Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. Oct. 21, 2002.

Before BOGGS, SUHRHEINRICH and CLAY, Circuit Judges.

This cause having come on to be heard upon the record, the briefs and the oral argument of the parties, and upon due consideration thereof.

It is ORDERED that the judgment of the district court be, and it hereby is, affirmed upon the opinion of the district court and for reasons stated on the record.
